001.prompt: spiraling staircases stretching infinitely upward into clouds, subject seen through an endless corridor or portal, exaggerated depth, angled view through a broken side window, subject offset and cropped, taking selfie from tilted camera, not facing directly, horizon twisted, sky blends into floor, subject falling diagonally, subject leaving motion trail like time echo,

scenes.text:
